shoeDescription: Created for the hardwood but taken to the streets, the Nike Dunk Low Retro returns with crisp overlays and original team colours. This basketball icon channels '80s vibes with premium leather in the upper that looks good and breaks in even better. Modern footwear technology helps bring the comfort into the 21st century.

The adidas Yeezy Slide Pure is constructed of Pure EVA foam with a soft footbed that offers an immediate step in comfort. An outsole with accentuated grooves for traction and support adds the finishing touches to the design. NOTE: UK and US sizing is the same for Yeezy slides.

This offering of the Nike Dunk Low returns in a traditional two-tone color blocking featuring a White leather base with Laser Orange overlays. White also appears on the nylon tongues, “NIKE” heel and insole branding and midsole, while Laser Orange laces, inner lining, insoles and rubber outsole completes the design.

In true Dunk fashion, the uppers come crafted entirely from premium leathers for a luxurious feel. The white underlays are contrasted by black panelling to make the design aspects of the sneaker pop. The monochromatic aesthetics of the shoe are amplified by the iconic swoosh being dressed in black too. Be sure to add this retro Nike Dunk to elevate your rotation.

Whenever a Jordan silhouette features the legendary UNC blue colourway, you know that sneaker will become a classic. This time around, we see the iconic blue hue grace the Air Jordan 4. The uppers are entirely wrapped in the legendary powder blue colour, ensuring that you know this is a UNC Air Jordan.

Size 5 in stock Now for RETAIL price. DM fast! Here to deliver the kids' feet with some fresh new heat are the Jordan 1 Low GS Crimson Tint. The iconic AJ1 comes clean in a bold new colourway that we're sure will freshen even the sickest of sneaker rotation, making it an absolute must-cop.
